assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Rossell India Limited cultivates, manufactures, and sells black tea in India. It operates through Cultivation, Manufacture, and Sale of Tea; and Aviation Products and Services. The company designs and develops avionics equipment. It also provides wire harness and test solutions; electronic systems and panels and racks; and engineering, manufacturing, after market, teaming, and product support services for defense public sector undertakings, defense research and development organization, Indian defense forces, and foreign original equipment manufacturers. The company owns and operates seven tea estates in Assam. It also exports its products to the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, Japan, the United Arab Emirates, etc. The company was formerly known as Rossell Tea Limited and changed its name to Rossell India Limited in April 2011. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India. Rossell India Limited is a subsidiary of BMG Enterprises Ltd.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Nirmal Kumar Khurana
companyOfficers.title: CFO, Director of Fin., Compliance Officer, Company Sec., Chief IR Officer & Director
